channel.title: admin on Anasuya Acharya
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Anasuya Acharya

item.description: I am currently a part of IBM Research, Bangalore, India, serving as Masters Student in the department of AI Tech. Prior to joining IBM Research, I was a Ph.D. scholar in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), IIT Bombay, working under the guidance of Prof. Pushpak Bhattacharyya. Here is my CV.
